title: banner.css

UrhG). * It is not allowed to make any kinds of modifications, nor must it be copied, * or published without explicit permission. Misuse will lead to persecution. * * @copyright 2011 infomax websolutions GmbH * @link http://www.infomax-it.de * @package css * @subpackage * @author Stefan Oswald <oswald@infomax-it.de> * @since 03.11.2011 * @version $Id: banner.css 2209 2016-03-15 14:59:10Z mueller $ **/ @media screen { #CONT_content .mainContentArea .banner span {display: block; margin-bottom: 4px; font-variant: small-caps;} #CONT_content .mainContentArea .banner.headline { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 670px; padding: 2px 5px; background: none repeat scroll 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); box-shadow: 0 1px 2px #000000; } #CONT_content .mainContentArea .banner.headline.wide {left: 1010px;} html.touch #CONT_content .mainContentArea .banner {display: none;} }
